name: Prince Akazaka x Princess
description:
This is a simple semi-nsfw themed JRPG. This JRPG is created using RPG Maker MV. This JRPG is very short and can be completed in less than 30 minutes, emphasizing the story element of saving several kingdoms. The player is given an unlimited power, money and inventory. All of that, so the players can only enjoy the story elements in it. intended for casual gamers.

Story

Prince Akihiko, the prince from modern kingdom Akazaka alongside with his wife, princess Aechara from modern kingdom Andong got isekaid into medieval isekai world from their modern world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, Prince Akihiko and Princess Aecha decided to save all princesses.

Features

  • JRPG battle turn based
  • Adventure up to 6 kingdom (each kingdom have 1 town & 1 castle with the interior and NPC. only items shop and weapon shop all pruchases able for player)
  • Casual (Easy Mode, only focus on story)
